title: project loading screen cards
body: if i buy project skin from project crafting do i will get loading screen card???

replies.body: will the project loading screen come back?
i get project yasuo, so if i buy him today i will get first strike border for him?when event will end?
I got the Leona project skin from fusing the blueprint with the cores, permanently unlocked it but no loading screen...{{item:3070}}

The First Strike Borders for project disruption are only for PROJECT: Ashe, PROJECT: Ekko, or PROJECT: Katarina.  Players who own Project Yasuo up to the end of the event can unlock a first strike border for him, though.  I hope that helps clarify, but we also have a[ project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide with more information.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I got an icon with ip, then I got a cache chest thing, so I opened it and it gave me Ashe first strike icon blueprint. It says that if I combine it with project cores, I get the project Ashe icon thing and I will unlock the first strike loading screen card for project Ashe. I don't understand what the loading screen thing is. Could anyone possibly explain?
can i get project zed first strike border???
